name: 文化研究與觀光
goals: To gain professional knowledge on tourism studies
To understand the cultural studies approaches
To obtain the capacity to create and design the tourist attraction
To understand the tourist practices and their cultural implication
syllabus:
Week 1 Cultural Studies on Tourism: An Introduction.  9/15  
When culture studies and tourism studies meet up

**Week 2 What is Tourism? Tourist Gaze and Beyond 9/22**

Urry, John and Jonas Larsen. 2011. _The Tourist Gaze3.0_. London: Sage. Chap 1, 8.

(中文版 觀光客的凝視 第二版 葉浩譯 台北: 書林)

Löfgren, Orvar. 1999. ‘Introduction’ in _On Holiday._ London: University of California Press. (中文版  度假 台北: 藍鯨出版社) preface, Chap 1, Chap8.

Shields, R. 1991. ‘Niagara Falls: Honeymoon capital of the world’ in _Places on the Margin: Alternative geographies of modernity_. London and New York: Routledge. Pp: 117-162.

Sheller, Mimi. 2003. ‘Iconic islands: nature, landscape, and the tropical tourist gaze’ in _Consuming the Caribbean_. London: Routledge.

Urry, John and Jonas Larsen. 2011. _Tourist Gaze. 3.0_. London: Routledge. Chap.6.

Ref:

Rowman & Littlefield Publishers, Inc.: Lanham, MD

Saulo Cwerner, Sven Kesselring and John Urry edited 2009. _Aeromobilities_. London: Routledge.

Cresswell, Tim. 2006 ‘The Production of Mobilities at Schiphol Airport, Amsterdam’ , _On the Move_. London: Routledge.

Auge, Marc. 1997. _Non places_. London: Verso.

Bowman, Michael and Phaedra C. Pezzullo. 2009. ‘What’s so ‘dark’ about ‘dark tourism’? Death, Tours, and Performance’, _Tourist Studies. Vol 9(3): 187-202._

Urry, John and Jonas Larsen. 2011. The Tourist Gaze. 3.0. London: Routledge. Ch. 9.

Ref:

_Lewis, Neil. 2000__._ **‘The Climbing Body, Nature and the Experience of Modernity’** in _Body and Society_. Vol. 6 (3): 58-80.

Urry, John. 2004. ‘Death in Venice’ in John Urry and Mimi Sheller (eds.) _Tourism. Mobilities: places to play, places in play_. London: Routledge.

Special topics: Dark tourism

**Week 16 Travelling inequality and the ethics of sightseeing 12/29**

Torpey, John. 2000. _The Invention of the Passport: Surveillance, Citizenship and the State._ New York: Cambridge University Press.

MacCannell, Dean. 2011. ‘Toward an ethics of sightseeing’, in _The Ethics of Sightseeing_. London: University of California Press.

Ref:

Bauman, Zygmunt. 1998. ‘Tourists and Vagabond’ in _Globalisation_. London: Polity Press.
